name: Galaxy of Empires skirmish demo
description:
Frogbone games - 2021 - Warning, the game contains fantasy violence, flashing lights and sudden image and sound effects!

Galaxy of Empires is a 3d, base-building, single player, epic scifi-fantasy RTS, currently in development.

In this demo, you'll have to control a small group of units (either colonial forces or state forces) and recapture a small planet which has been taken by the Pirate Guild.

You can try both sides, and try some of their units. They are not yet fully ready, and you cannot build buildings yet, but in the final game, I'm planning to have two large factions, with alien allies on both sides, and with ground forces, space forces, navy and others. 

This is a pre-alpha demo, there could be many bugs in this version. Also, the radar enhancements don't yet work.

Main features include:
- multiple special abilities even for starting units (like afterburner, tractor beam, or shield)
- developing units, even in combat, customizing not just bigger ships but also smaller units
- multi-level battlefield (including space and ground)
- interactive maps (destroyable asteroids, capturable buildings)
